details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
25-30 sq. m.
* per 4-Liters at 1.7-1.4 mils DFT

details.name: Tinting
details.info: Will accept BOYSEN®® Oil Tinting Colors at a maximum level of ¼ Liter per 4-Liter can. Take note that B‑2319 Hansa Yellow and B‑2315 Bulletin Red are for interior painting only.

details.name: Thinning Solvent
details.info: Thin with not more than 1-Liter of BOYSEN®® Paint Thinner B‑0340 per 4-Liter can of NATION alkyd enamel products.

details.name: Packaging
details.info:
¼-Liter, 1-Liter, and 4-Liters
(16-Liters also available for White)
